newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean debt market closed for national holiday.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean debt market closed for national holiday.

text.p: South Korea's bond market is closed on Monday for Children's Day. It will reopen on Tuesday.
Both three-year and three-month benchmark bond yields closed flat on Friday, and the overnight call rate fell, dealers said.
The market was closed on Thursday for Labour Day.
* 3-yr corporates close flat at 12.50 pct on Friday
* Average overnight call at 13.94 pct vs Wednesday's 14.39
